description: FIDO2/WebAuthn registration and authentication flow lockdown

files.description: Main FIDO2 registration flow component - handles device registration, WebAuthn API calls, and activation
FIDO2 configuration page - policy selection and FIDO2 settings
FIDO2 authentication page - device selection, WebAuthn authentication, and assertion check
Modal for when user already has a FIDO2 device (only one allowed per user)
FIDO2 device registration and activation service methods (registerFIDO2Device, activateFIDO2Device)
FIDO2 authentication service - assertion check (checkFIDO2Assertion) and device authentication initialization
FIDO2 flow controller - handles FIDO2-specific flow logic and device filtering
FIDO2 configuration storage - stores FIDO2 settings (attestation, authenticatorAttachment, etc.)
